front.title: Multicast Channel Allocation Protocol (MCAP) for IEEE 1394

abstract.t: This docuent specifies how IP-capable Serial Bus devices may allocate IEEE 1394 channel nuber(s) for use in the multicast transmission of IP datagras. It defines the necessary methods, data structures and codes for that purpose. See also the ost recent revision of draft-ietf-ip1394-ipv4 for a specification of the transport of IPv4 datagras over IEEE 1394.
